org.apache.river.test.share

Class TesterTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.test.share.TesterTransaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionConstants

    public class TesterTransaction
extends Object
implements net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionConstants
    This is the transaction type used by TesterTransactionManager. Currently it only supports single-participant transactions.
    See Also:
    TesterTransactionManager
